summary:
This mod gives you 3 rooms near Falkarth with Boss like fights (lots of decently strong foes and one much stronger one).

This is based on Raid Bosses from other RPGs, I suggest you go in these rooms with at least 5 companions, or alone if you are OP enough.
descriptionHtml:
It's my second mod, just giving a heads up because it's awful.
Fast travel to a shrine near Falkreath in the map to get to the boss rooms.

[youtube]X6hwEtfwhW8[/youtube]
Description:

This mod gives you 3 rooms near Falkreath with Boss like fights (lots of decently strong foes and one much stronger one).
This is based on Raid Bosses from other RPGs, I suggest you go in these rooms with at least 5 companions, or alone if you are OP enough.

This mod is for those end game characters with super high gear.

It's not lore friendly at all.

If you kill certain enemies you can loot a Spell Tome from each of them.


Installing:

Just install it normally(using either the Manager or just extracting files in the Skyrim data folder).

Requires:

The latest Skyrim version.

Didn't see any bugs while testing, if you notice any feel free to complain.

Endorse it if you liked it!

Any honest feedback is much appreciated!
author: Markdobrasil
